# Draft:Edward C. Day Jr.

Edward Charles Day Jr. (December 21, 1908 â€“ October 17, 1999) was an associate justice of the Colorado Supreme Court from 1957 to 1976.
Born in Denver.
Regis High School, 1926.
Day and Albert T. Frantz, elected at the same time, were the first two Catholics to serve on the state supreme court. Day "worked on the Register editorial staff when taking his law course".
Details from https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/105393277/edward-charles-day, better source needed.
Married Lilian Margaret Famular, 1931. Died in Denver.
